jobDescription: Senior Data ScientistThis is an exciting opportunity to join a pioneer financial company. The ideal candidate is a strong data scientist with a strong grasp on machine learning techniques and strong software development skills preferably with Python or PerlResponsibilities:Build and optimize predictive models using machine learning and other algorithmsBuild, optimize and quickly decipher patterns within large quantity of data and to reference key characteristics using visualization techniquesExamine teams Data Algorithms and lead to improvementsExperience with predictive models, data-driven analysis and application of machine learning algorithmsWrite code (Python) to perform online stream processing and offline batch processing from a data lake and relational databasesLeveraging strong math skills and statistical knowledge to advanced data mining and data analysis activitiesRequirements:Ph.D in statistics, engineering, math, physics, computer scienceExperience with coding (python, perl preferred), and working with SQL data setsExperience analyzing large data setsExperience with Machine learning Build New Data ModelsApply Neural Networks (machine learning techniques)Suggest/implement improvements or corrections
